#Text=Canada 's Beaches — East York ( Ward 32 ) city council candidates speak
#Text=Friday , November 3 , 2006
#Text=On November 13 , Torontonians will be heading to the polls to vote for their ward 's councillor and for mayor .
#Text=Among Toronto 's ridings is Beaches — East York ( Ward 32 ) .
#Text=Four candidates responded to Wikinews ' requests for an interview .
#Text=This ward 's candidates include Donna Braniff , Alan Burke , Sandra Bussin ( incumbent ) , William Gallos , John Greer , John Lewis , Erica Maier , Luca Mele , and Matt Williams .
#Text=For more information on the election , read Toronto municipal election , 2006 .
#Text=Sandra Bussin ( incumbent )
#Text=Sandra Bussin is the incumbent for Ward 32 , Beaches — East York .
#Text=Q : Describe the three most important issues in your campaign .
#Text=A :

#Text=1. A Safe Environment and Our Community Health : Our community worked hard to shut down the incinerators at Ashbridges Bay Sewage Treatment Plant -the biggest producer of carbon-dioxide emissions and other significant airborne contaminants of all of the City 's facilities .
#Text=Today , our community 's health and environment is greatly improved because of this shutdown .
#Text=However , the need to find a garbage solution for Toronto has placed a spotlight on this site as a potential location to build a garbage incinerator .
#Text=It is important that our community play an active role to ensure that thoughtful decisions are made .
#Text=2.
#Text=Planning Development Change
#Text=: The popularity of the Beach has currently stimulated significant developer interest in land assembly .
#Text=The need to protect the unique character of our neighbourhoods is a critical and key concern .
#Text=The new Official Plan will be put to the test in upcoming development applications verses the over-arching Provincial Planning Act and the Ontario Municipal Board .
#Text=I will push for " fine grain " tools that recognize the need to protect mature neighbourhoods , as well as to provide design guidelines to support the unique character of our neighbourhoods .
#Text=Strongly enhancing community engagement in all aspects of the planning process is also needed .
#Text=3. Clean Beach and Waterfront Renewal Strategy : The development of Toronto 's waterfront is a key goal .
#Text=The success of the Beaches-East York community is attributed , in part , to its interface with Lake Ontario .

#Text=I am proud of the work underway to create significant landscape improvements at Ashbridges Bay which will be included in the expansive 750 acre Lake Ontario Park , stretching from the eastern border of Scarborough to the westerly edge of Etobicoke .
#Text=I will push the major clean-up of Coatsworth Cut/Ashbridges Bay .
#Text=The Balmy Beach area is also earmarked for the " Clean Beaches Strategy " which is a priority for me .

column1: #Text=The major skateboard park I am building for the youth and young-at-heart is to be completed in 2007 -for all to enjoy .
#Text=Q : What one election issue do you feel is most relevant to your ward in this election ?
#Text=A : The looming garbage solution is a key issue .
#Text=The expansive lands at Ashbridges Bay and the Eastern Portlands are zoned to accommodate such heavy industrial uses .

#Text=Our community and I will be vigilant and active in the process underway by a citizen selected advisory team ( CEAT ) to recommend both the technology and the site for the method of disposing of the City 's residual waste .
